name: iconsense
description: Instantly preview images and CSS icons on hover, with smart autocomplete and easy access to your favorite icons.
author: Mehmet Coskun

iconSense.autoScanCss.description: Scan all CSS files in the workspace. When disabled, IconSense scans only CSS files explicitly imported or linked by your project (HTML, JS/TS, Vue, Nuxt, React, Next).

iconSense.autoOpenIconPickerPanel.description: Automatically open the Icon Picker panel when detecting icon class names in your code. Example shcema <i class='

iconsense.debug.showIconIndex.description: Show icon index numbers on each icon for debugging and advanced inspection.

iconSense.scanHtml.description: Scan HTML files for icon class usage.

iconSense.scanCss.description: Scan CSS files for icon class usage.

iconSense.scanJsTs.description: Scan JavaScript and TypeScript files for icon usage.

iconSense.scanPhp.description: Scan PHP files for icon usage (class attributes and string literals).

iconSense.framework.vue.description: Enable Vue-specific icon detection (template bindings, :class, v-bind).

iconSense.framework.nuxt.description: Enable Nuxt-specific icon detection (Nuxt pages, layouts, components).

iconSense.framework.react.description: Enable React icon detection (JSX className, dynamic expressions).

iconSense.framework.next.description: Enable Next.js specific detection (App Router, Server Components).

iconSense.showNotifications.description: Show tree-shaking warnings and notifications. Analysis always runs in the background.
